org.smartfrog.services.xunit.timeouts
Interface TimeoutCompound

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
TimeoutCompoundImpl
public interface TimeoutCompound
extends java.rmi.Remote

This component is a compound that kills its children after a defined time in seconds if they have not already terminated of their own accord. It lets us add timeouts around a test suite or other component, without adding lots of timeout logic to the component itself. Warning: Java does not really like threads being killed. The safest way to work with this is to run the child components in their own processes. TimeoutCompoundSchema extends Schema { failOnTimeout extends Boolean; //message to get logged at info level timeoutMessage extends String; //timeout in seconds. If <=0 the timeout is disabled timeout extends Integer; }*
